content: crochet a fun african flower bag with this easy pattern it will carry all your essentials while adding a fun boho touch to any outfit the step-by-step photo tutorial for this colorful crochet granny bag makes it simple to follow you will only need 13 squares made with your favorite dk weight cotton yarn light worsted and a 4 mm hook you can adjust the size of the squares by using different yarn weights and the placement of color changes can create various effects **materials** sirdar stories dk - 60% cotton 40% acrylic 140m 153yds 50g main color mc 2 balls in picnic 815 contrast colors 1 ball in each of the following colors a sunseekers 812 813 b beachclub 834 c pillow talk 803 d date night 808 4 mm & 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle you can use any dk weight/light worsted weight yarn to achieve a similar effect if using stash yarn you will need approximately 450m of dk weight/light worsted weight yarn **measurements** height of bag not including handles - 11 5in - 29cm width of bag 10 5in - 27cm handle straps 20in - 51cm each square is 4 x 4in - 10 x 10cm made using dk weight yarn
